title: Publish current build to production (make latest UI changes live)

requirements.text: Promote the current deployed draft (including the latest smooth-zoom profile image preview behavior) to the live/production deployment so end users see the updated experience.
acceptanceCriteria: The production/live URL serves the same UI/behavior as the latest draft build.
The profile image full-screen preview overlay uses the smooth zoom + fade animation on open and close, and still supports backdrop click, Escape key, and close button to dismiss.

nonGoals: Do not add new features or change UI copy; this request is only to make the current version live.
